enseeiht.name: ENSEEIHT Toulouse
enseeiht.desc: After the two-years in CPGE, I was admitted into ENSEEIHT's numerical science department.

cpge.name: CPGE Moulay Youssef
cpge.desc: I chose to complete my studies in CPGE, since it was the only gateway to a good university in the field of Computer science.

bac.name: Al Imaniat School
bac.desc: I got my bachelor degree in the field of Math science, in Morocco.

desktop.title: Desktop Development
desktop.desc: I developed many softwares for the Windows plateform using languages such as C#, Python, C++ and with frameworks like .NET and Qt5.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.desc: Using Java as the main language, I created good looking and lightweight mobile apps for the Android platform.

ringtone_manager.title: Ringtone Manager
ringtone_manager.desc: My first Android app which manages ringtones with features like cropping, shuffling, etc

wallpapers.title: Wallpapers
wallpapers.desc: An Android app that downloads wallpapers from a remote server

me.title: Me
me.content:
My name is Hamza Hathoute, 22 years old and I am a student pursuing an engineering degree in software development.
My birth town is Agadir - Morocco, but currently living in Toulouse - France.
I started programming from a young age, basically creating mods for Counter-Strike using #url{AMXX,https://www.amxmodx.org/} and #url{SourceMod,https://www.sourcemod.net/}.

website.title: This Website
website.content:
This website was built in May 2022.
The sole reason for building this website was to learn #tool{react,17} and get familiar with fullstack development, since I was looking for an internship and I could only find web development internships.
